column5: Got out the last couple evenings with a buddy to put a hurting on the Simcoe Lakers.Â  Hope you enjoy the video. What a blast!
NIce. Caught a laker years ago on Simcoe in Sept on a shoal with a crankbait. Fishing how smallies Spawning or prespawn How do you know big belly is full stomach or eggs this time of year?
Full of gobies or eggs, lol.
Dirty bait, LOL Working for me. Bass swim bait. LOL
looks like soooooo much fun ! well done dude
